statements: SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_id, score FROM user_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, score FROM user_progress WHERE quiz_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_progress ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT count(*) FROM user_progress WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, score, completion_status FROM user_progress WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, score FROM user_progress ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_active_users FROM user_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE score > 70 AND completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM user_progress;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY course_id;
SELECT user_id, email, join_date FROM users JOIN courses ON user_id = 5 WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, join_date FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM user_progress;
SELECT course_id, user_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT user_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM quiz_scores GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, course_id, completion_status FROM course_completion WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT user_id, course_id, completion_status FROM course_completion WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM user_progress INNER JOIN course_completion ON user_progress.user_id = course_completion.user_id
SELECT user_id, course_id, MIN(progress_percentage) AS min_progress, MAX(progress_percentage) AS max_progress FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id, course_id
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT course_id, user_id, completed FROM course_completion WHERE completed = true;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
